description: This file defines an authentication gate component for a React application, providing sign-in and registration interfaces with form handling and state management.

methods.name: AuthGateScreen
methods.description: Main component that toggles between Sign In and Register screens.

methods.name: LoginScreen
methods.description: Component for the user to input email and password to sign in.

methods.name: RegisterScreen
methods.description: Component for the user to input email and password to register.
